title: The Magic of Found Objects Book Club
description:
It’s finally time for The Magic of Found Objects Book Club! This Book felt totally different than others we’ve read recently and we’re so excited to talk about it! 

The story follows Phronsie, who was conceived at Woodstock by a free-spirited hippie mother and a practical farmer father. All her life she’s been torn between the two. After trying her hand at the NYC dating scene, her childhood best friend proposes that they give up on romance and marry each other. After Phronsie agrees, she meets someone who makes a case for revisiting romance. While her stepmother argues for the safety of the engagement, her birth mother relays messages from the universe to hold out for true love, and Phronsie must look to her own heart to find the answers.

In addition to talking all about the book, we also talk about Becca’s trip to Palm Beach, Grace’s birthday party prep, and the struggle of being a beginner again at something you used to be great at. 

Instagram Obsessions

@margaret.wright

@ashnb1

Obsessions

AFI’s 100 List

What we’ve read

The Identicals by Elin Hilderbrand

The Perfect Find by Tia Williams

White Smoke by Tiffany D Jackson

Apples Never Fall by Liane Moriarity

Reminders of Him by Colleen Hoover

October Book:

A Special Place for Women by Laura Hankin

Sponsors:

Join our Facebook group for amazing book recs & more!

Like and subscribe to RomComPods. Available wherever you listen to podcasts. Visit Grace’s blog, The Stripe. New posts daily!

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast. Follow Grace on Instagram @graceatwood and Becca @beccamfreeman.
